author: metachris_
content: We've updated the Flashbots Relays for Kiln, Ropsten and Sepolia. Please let us know if you see any issues! (one of the changes includes that validator-registrations of any size are now handled quickly, so no need to batch them into small batches anymore.)

author: metachris_
content: btw, https://beaconchain.kiln.themerge.dev/ is down since a while

author: metachris_
content: the nginx logs say we're at about 1ms response time for status, getHeader and getPayload calls btw. The remainder should be network delays. (validator registrations seem to be handled in about 2-150ms, depending on the size)
